backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing median-based price estimates and mock product recognition using static sample data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten short summaries for key frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout with header, footer, theme-based styling, and the PriceEstimatorPage.
frontend/src/components/EstimateResultCa: UI card showing formatted price results, timestamps, confidence warnings, and sample breakdowns.
frontend/src/components/PriceEstimatorPa: Handles image upload, drag-and-drop, preview, validation, submission, and displays estimation results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance, updating when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePriceEstimate.ts: Implements a hook that sends a demo value to backend actors to fetch price estimates and recognized products, managing loading and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/utils/imageFile.ts: Validates image files for type and size, and provides helper functions for creating and revoking preview URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, component settings, and animations leveraging OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, features, and pending requests for uploading product images and estimating prices.
